name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crime stats and Photos in Airbnb Listings

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View crime statistics and nearby photos in Airbnb listings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds additional information to Airbnb listings including local crime statistics and nearby photos.

This extension is in no way affiliated with or endorsed by Airbnb.

No guarantees are given regarding the accuracy of data or information displayed by this extension.
